SELECT coffee_id,name,kind,price, DATE_FORMAT(reg_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS reg_day,DATE_FORMAT(mod_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS mod_day FROM coffee WHERE 1=1
AND reg_day >= DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY)
AND reg_day >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strStart_date},'%Y%m%d') AND reg_day < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{strEnd_date},'%Y%m%d'),INTERVAL+1 DAY)
AND name LIKE CONCAT(#{strName},'%')
AND kind = #{strKind}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coffee(name,kind,price) VALUES (#{name},#{kind},CAST(#{price} as INTEGER))
mapper.select: SELECT coffee_id,name,kind,price, DATE_FORMAT(reg_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS reg_day, DATE_FORMAT(mod_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS mod_day FROM coffee WHERE coffee_id = CAST(#{strCoffee_id} as INTEGER)
mapper.update: UPDATE coffee SET name=#{strName},kind=#{strKind},price=CAST(#{strPrice} as INTEGER) WHERE coffee_id = CAST(#{strCoffee_id} as INTEGER)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM coffee WHERE coffee_id = CAST(#{strCoffee_id} AS INTEGER)
